resources.string:
1.0.0 - Initial release!
• View a season overview
• See the results for all F1 races from 2019 dating back to 2000
• See the qualifying results for Q1, Q2 and Q3 for all races
• As of May 2020 it is unclear what the 2020 season will look like, so I cannot guarantee that new races will be updated live

1.0.2 - Tidying up
• Changed app flow to default to the season overview screens rather than the 2019 season
• Changed theme throughout so it can be more customisable down the road

2.0.0 - Back to the beginning
• Overhauled UI for viewing the history of F1
• Flashback now supports all races from 1950 to 2019
• See a breakdown of the constructor standings per race
• Fixed some blank spaces in 2017 race data
• Updated components to 2.0.1

3.0.0 - Championship standings
• Added championship standings options to all seasons
• Added daily sync for current
• Updated firebase dependencies

4.0.0 - New look and feel
• Shifted app design over to a Material Design 2 inspired UI
• Improved network state management
• The usual disclaimer of general data patching and bug fixes

4.1.0 - Dark mode!
• Added dark mode toggle to settings
• Added grid penalty indicator to race qualifying view

4.3.0 - News feed!
• Added news feed to the app
• Added ability to toggle preferred news sources
• Added status for race data being synchronised

4.3.5 - Shuffle time
• Moved news to it\'s own screen
• Fixed race status oversight in prep for 2020 season start
• Changed loading stack to only show spinner and not skeleton views on initial load
• Tidied up network logging
• Fixed pit lane starts not being filtered properly in qualifying view
• Updated swiperefesh to 1.1.0
• Updated components to 2.1.0
• Updated utilities to 2.0.1
• Updated firebase analytics to 17.4.3
• Updated firebase crashlytics to 2.10.1

4.4.1 - 2020 season start
• Addressed some bugs that have risen due to season starting
• Fixed issue with partial qualifying data not displaying when race data is unavailable
• Added setting to expand season list to full height by default
• Fixed some wording oversights with races being scheduled in the future or past
• Fixed optional message being displayed
• Moved app banner position to pinned position at the top of the display

4.4.3 - Track images
• Added track layout images to some of the modern tracks
• Added qualifying and race data distinction with data availability
• Added constructor colour bar to qualifying and race details to make driver\'s constructor more obvious
• Fixed DNF label showing when driver finishes normally
• Fixed message label appearing in top of screen properly

4.4.6 - Driver statuses
• Updated layout for driver season status to be less confusing
• Fixed theming bugs on maps links
• Fixed incorrect round being used as reference message for driver stats

4.5.0 - Behind the scenes
• Backend fixes to data management
• Added notification for when results are being pulled
• Fix for Perez qualifying data showing up in Round 4 2020 data
• Fix for closing driver season dropdown collapsing again
• Moved constructor color bars to edge
View the app intro screens again
Show the lap time delta alongside the qualifying time when displaying qualifying results
Show the drivers of a constructor alongside the constructor points scored per race
Shows the grid penalty that a driver has in the qualifying view
When clicking the seasons tab, the sheet will default to going full screen rather than half height
Toggle if the favourites section inside the seasons list is expanded by default
Toggle if the all section inside the seasons list is expanded by default
Select the view type that you want to view race information in
About the application and the developer
What I want to add to this app in the future
Send device information and crash stack traces to the developer
Your crash reporting preference will be applied once the app has restarted
Send the developer an email with any suggestions you may have. Alternately turn on shake to report and shake your device
Shake the app to report a bug or a feature?
Shake the app at any time to screenshot and send me any bugs, issues, or suggestions you may have for this app!
Your shake to report preference will be applied once the app has restarted
Show the article description alongside the news source if it has one
Toggle javascript being loaded in the app browser. Disabling javascript should make the page and content load quicker but areas of the website may not perform properly
A big thank you to everyone listed below for helping make this app possible!

Special thanks to
 - Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
 - Icons made by Vitaly Gorbachev from www.flaticon.com
 - Animations made by LottieFiles from www.lottiefiles.com
 - Animations made by Abhishek Kaushal from www.lottiefiles.com

 If we've missed anyone or anything please let me know
Statistics are shown as of the %s round of the grand prix, the %s. %d rounds to go
It will also host round %s of this season
It will also host the %s rounds of this season
This season has not started yet, please check back after the first race to see the results!
We don\'t yet have any data on this season yet, please check back later while we work on getting this
This race has not yet happened, please check back after the race to see the results
We don\'t have this information yet, it should be available after the race (race results can take up to 12 hours to appear)
Unfortunately we don\'t have any information for this yet, please check back you have an internet connection and try again
A network error occurred! Please check you are connected to the internet and try again
A network error occurred and we weren\'t able to find any articles. Please check your internet connection or try again later
All news sources have been disabled - Please enable a preferred source and try again
We can\'t find any information on this circuit.
Here\'s what\'s changed since you last updated
